SCRIPT REQUIRED FOR PURCHASE

This product requires a valid prescription from an authorised health practitioner. Send your script to team@evelynfaye.com.au, along with your name, contact number and delivery address or pick up location. An order will be generated and sent to you for payment before despatch. Please ensure to include the email address for your online customer account if you have registered one.
